rows.label: qst103405_msg0001
rows.name:
You're worried about me?
No, I can't say I've run into any
trouble in particular...

rows.label: qst103405_msg0002
rows.name:
What? You were attacked by a huge
force of soldiers...and they threatened
that harm would come to me as well?

rows.label: qst103405_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, they haven't tried anything yet.
And I can't imagine they could get
close, as long as I stay in the palace.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0004
rows.name:
I've brought my son to the palace
as well, just to be safe. I even have
guards watching over him.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0005
rows.name:
What worries me is that the enemy
was gathered in far greater numbers
than my information suggested.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0006
rows.name:
Was the information that it would be
a small gathering simply mistaken?
Or were they expecting us?

rows.label: qst103405_msg0007
rows.name:
That Blade named Akatsuki who seems
to be giving the orders...he may be a
more formidable foe than I had feared.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0009
rows.name:
Whatever the reason, I must apologize
for sending you into such danger.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0010
rows.name:
I actually just received new
information about where the
Brionac leaders are headed.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0011
rows.name:
The word "leaders" makes me suspect
that Akatsuki's Driver may be involved.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0012
rows.name:
This may be an opportunity to
neutralize Akatsuki once and for all...
But it may also be another trap.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0013
rows.name: Thank you so much for all your help.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0014
rows.name: As for where to find these leaders...

rows.label: qst103405_msg0015
rows.name:
One of them, a man named Wagan,
should be on the roof of a building
in Ayvill Shopping District.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0016
rows.name:
In the roof area of the Old Industrial
District, you should find a man
named Bhianc.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0017
rows.name:
And finally, there's Arrodh.
He should be near the large tank
by the Cargo Transportation Zone.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0018
rows.name:
If my intelligence is correct, these three
Brionac leaders will be conducting
covert transactions at those locations.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0019
rows.name: Please do be careful.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0101
rows.name:
Akatsuki may be a formidable Blade,
but any Blade can be neutralized by
taking down their Driver.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0102
rows.name:
This is our chance to take down
the anti-imperialists of Brionac
once and for all.
